about_the_game:
Your first mission, Rift seeker, landing on a barren and unexplored new planet, you are tasked to create a thriving new colonial outpost and find the secrets of the void rifts around...
Are you ready seeker?

Build bases for your seekers and the entities you find:

Be quick to satisfy your colonists every need or suffer the consequences, contain what you find on your explorations and manage the resources you collect, all before your workers go mad from interacting with these mysteries of the void.

Contain the unknown:

With a huge collection of different possible entities you can find it will be quite a challenge to find and possibly contain all of them. From small and mischievous little imps to gigantic terrors of the void and mysterious artefacts, its your mission to seek them out.

Contain the unknown:

Make sure to build up all the necessary facilities to keep your seekers happy, give them bathrooms and a place to clean themselves to watch your base turn to filth.

Try to make the best of it:

Give your workers a break with colorful and cute decorations, create a base of beauty. Adding extra benefits not only help your eyes but also keeps your seekers from going wild, manage their sanity and energy levels or watch them go mad and do uncontrollable things.

Tons of different resources:

Grow food, medicine, and other kinds of plants. Collect the resources from the planet and the rifts, cook favorite foods to keep your seekers and contained entities happy.

Procedurally Generated Experience:

Every playthrough will be different, randomized seekers with their own unique looks and stats, new world that holds its own resources and chances to find different and rare enities, but be careful, the less it is seen, the more dangerous it will be!

short_description: Mission: Rift seeker is a colony simulation game about building and managing your base on an unknown planet and exploring the surrounding void rifts that are full of horrific and mysterious entities that you are tasked to capture before they to eat the brave and fluffy seekers that you command.
